reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than expensive pillows!
reviews.reviewText: After reading Good Housekeeping reviews of the best pillows for 2024 and these were at #2, I bought a King set. I have tried many pillows over the last 3 years. Very expensive ones that were over $100 each to affordable. These pillows are affordable and provide an excellent nights sleep! You can’t beat the price! I’ve had $100 pillows hurt my neck and give me a headache within 4 days. I’ve used one of these for a week and no pain! You do have to fluff them up a bit every morning when you make your bed. I put it in the dryer on low just in case of bed bugs and I do this with all bedding I buy. Fluffed up great, not too much loftiness or too flat. It’s basically perfectly affordable and comfortable! I will purchase a new set when it’s time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars wanted a softer pillow so this is perfect
reviews.reviewText: I had a memory foam pellet like filling pillow. It's supposed to give support, yet be soft. I found that the small memory foam pieces was quite firm and only compressed so much so ended up feeling harder then normal. So i wanted to go back to a normal pillow, so when i read this is a down alternative pillow, i decided to try it. I had a down pillow that was really soft and this was similar in that it does feel soft and compresses much more when you want it to compress and that makes all the difference. Anyways, it does feel comfortable and i use the stiffer pillows now as a back brace when reading. Anyways, good pillow for sleeping, it's what i'm used to.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great, soft, high-quality pillows, but too thick for me
reviews.reviewText: This will be a brief review of my pillow journey. I tried a few of the most popular pillows, like MyPillow, Amazon Basics, bamboo/shredded foam, memory pillows, but my most common complaint about them were that they were all just too high and firm for me. I am a restless sleeper and alternate between back, side, and stomach sleeping, and I strongly preferred the stomach sleeper/flat pillows with a polyester fiber/down alternative filling.Here's a ranking of my 4 top pillows:Eversnug Adjustable Layer Pillows - (#1)These were THE pillow for me. I had never heard of these pillows or the company, but I really like being able to adjust my pillow. These pillows came with 2 small, 2 medium, and 2 large pillows and 2 twin zippable pillow pouches. All of them were polyester fiber filled and somewhat flat and soft, but not lumpy. The pillows may not come the exact same sizes, but they are close enough for me. These are the pillows I ultimately decided to stick with, despite being slightly more expensive than the others at $50 for a set of 2 pillows.Nappler Bamboo Shredded Memory Foam Pillow - (#2)Before I found the Eversnug pillows, I was trying the adjustable bamboo shredded memory foam ones. These were my go-to whenever I was testing pillows I didn't like very much. The only downside to these pillows is that if you don't add enough filling, you could feel the edges of the shredded foam. Also, the "bamboo" cover was way too warm and the inner zipper would get too easily caught.Amazon Basics Down Alternative Pillow - (#3)I don't think I've ever been disappointed by an Amazon Basics product yet. These pillows were soft, amazing pillows, but they were 1-2 inches too thick/firm for me.MyPillow - (#4)Despite all the hype around these, they were too lumpy and 1 inch too thick for me.Like I said previously, I ended up going with the Eversnug Adjustable pillows, which I absolutely adore. A tiny bonus is that you can take the pillows you don't use and rest them on your sides or between your knees for some extra cushioning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for side sleepers
reviews.reviewText: This is the most comfortable pillow I have ever purchased. In the past I have tried several expensive down pillows and they get too flat. This pillow stays cool and holds its shape all night. I have ordered a set twice. I did not expect much at this price, but they are wonderful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have searched for years for the right pillows—and spent lots of money—but these pillows are wonderful!! I’m a back and side sleeper, and these pillows comfortably support my neck, while not hurting my ears! Try them!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Eh. Soft, but not what I’m looking for
reviews.reviewText: There is one supreme pillow on the earth…and this, my friends, is NOT it! I do agree with the other reviewers that these pillows are very soft (to the touch, but not in firmness.) These feel great, fluff up nicely and provide a comfy support. Unfortunately, that’s not ALL I’m looking for in a pillow. I want more!These are not good for me. I’m a side sleeper, and after sleeping on this pillow, I woke up many times through the night, to adjust my position. My neck and back ached through the last few hours of my sleep, until finally, I had to get out of bed. Not great, right? Nope.Like I said, there is one supreme pillow brand, that reigns above them all, and those are the ones found at Hampton Inn Hotels. I thought that perhaps, these might come close, (based on so many positive reviews) but boy was I wrong. These are way too firm for me (even though they are labeled as “soft.” So I will be returning these, and buying my pillows directly from the shop Hampton site (something I didn’t even know was possible until today.) After trying another hotel brand, then MyPillow, and now these, I’m not messing around any more. I’m going to pay for comfort and peaceful sleep! These are being returned tomorrow.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars One the best
reviews.reviewText: I’m not a fan of a big, fluffy pillow. This is nothing to it. It’s soft, memorable foamy and it doesn’t puff up When You put your head down. I’m very sensitive when it comes to that and I found a great pillow to help me sleep at night

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great value for product. They did take awhile to fluff up from their packaging. (About 36 hours) but they are comfortable.
Me encantaron y además traen un forro que las protege que es muy bueno para que duren más tiempo limpias .

reviews.reviewerName: Me encantó, suave y de tamaño adecuado
reviews.reviewText: No pierden la forma... me encantaron
I purchased these about a month ago and they are the best pillows I’ve used! They stay plush and support my head better than anything else I’ve ever had! 10/10 will buy again

Apesar de algunas reseñas negativas me atreví a comprarlas con un poco de temor, pero cuando las saqué del embalaje por qué vienen herméticamente comprimidas, las abrí de la bolsa y esperé un rato para q solitas tomen su forma!Las recomiendo!!! Son suaves pero no aguadas, tienen el tamaño Perfecto y el soporte Perfecto también. Si buscas unas almohadas para un buen descanso, estás para mi han sido de las mejores que he tenido!! Y por el precio , súpero y rebasó mis expectativas por mucho!!! ❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️
Están súper cómodas!! Duermes muy agusto. Recomendables ampliamente!!
